articles.title: Russia warns of nuclear, hypersonic deployment if Sweden and Finland join NATO - CTV News
articles.description: One of Russian President Vladimir Putin's closest allies warned NATO on Thursday that if Sweden and Finland joined the U.S.-led military alliance then Russia would deploy nuclear weapons and hypersonic missiles in an exclave in the heart of Europe.
articles.content:

articles.title: Vladimir Putin warns against phasing out Russian gas - The Indian Express
articles.description: The European Union is dependent on Russia for 40% of its natural gas and 25% of its oil.
articles.content: Russian President Vladimir Putin has warned that Western countries’ attempts to phase out Russian gas imports will have a negative impact on their economies.Speaking Thursday, Putin said European att… [+540 chars]

articles.title: Webb space telescope cools to 6K to tackle dark current eeNews Europe - eeNews Europe
articles.description: The Mid-Infrared Instrument (MIRI) on the James Webb space telescope has dropped to 6.4 K to tackle dark currents in the sensor.

articles.title: Taoiseach warns business leaders that Ireland faces moment of ‘great crisis’ - BreakingNews.ie
articles.description: Micheál Martin said Russia’s war has created challenges across the European Union.
articles.content:
